content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace array at position (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1.0, 1.0) with iron ore input and producing iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position (3.0, 0.0) currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before inserting items. Check the inventory of the furnace to avoid inserting into a furnace that is not ready.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Be cautious of the furnace's inventory status before extracting items. If the furnace is empty or has insufficient items, extraction will not yield results.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh or check the status of entities on the map to ensure you are working with the most current data. Avoid relying on outdated information that may lead to incorrect actions.
